body_html: Thanks @arunmandal53 for taking the time to write the tutorial. However, I need to install Tensorflow in the Python installation that is under my home account rather than installing Tensorflow on Python that comes with Ubuntu. I think that I need to wait until Tensorflow releases a version that can be installed using pip and is compatible with CUDA 10 (and cuDNN)

body: Thanks @arunmandal53 for taking the time to write the tutorial. However, I need to install Tensorflow in the Python installation that is under my home account rather than  installing Tensorflow on Python that comes with Ubuntu. I think that I need to wait until Tensorflow releases a version that can be installed using pip and is compatible with CUDA 10 (and cuDNN)
